fields.description: We have some new CoreMotion APIs (https://developer.apple.com/library/prerelease/content/releasenotes/General/iOS10APIDiffs/Objective-C/CoreMotion.html) that could be covered in our ti.coremotion module. Specifically the {{CMAltimeter}} for measuring significant elevation updates and {{CMPedometerEvent}} for pedometer event-details.
